layout_violations.description: Widget 'App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkFrame_1.CTkFrame_0.CTkLabel_1' text ('Diff File:') may be truncated: estimated width ~78px vs available ~58px
layout_violations.recommended_fix: Increase the width of 'App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkFrame_1.CTkFrame_0.CTkLabel_1' or shorten its text to prevent truncation

accessibility_issues.recommended_fix: Ensure 'App_root.CTkFrame_0.CTkButton_0' is enabled when the user can reasonably invoke the action, or provide inline guidance explaining what is needed

ux_issues.description: Button labels use mixed text casing styles: Title Case: App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkButton_0, App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkFrame_4.CTkButton_0, App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkFrame_4.CTkButton_1; Mixed: App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_1.CTkFrame_1.CTkButton_0, App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_1.CTkFrame_1.CTkButton_3. This creates visual inconsistency.
ux_issues.recommended_fix: Standardise all button labels to 'Title Case' casing for visual consistency.

ux_issues.description: Label 'App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkFrame_2.CTkLabel_1' (text: 'Review Types (select one or more):') appears to be a field label but has no input widget in the same container.
ux_issues.recommended_fix: Move 'App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_0.CTkFrame_2.CTkLabel_1' to the same container as its associated input widget, or remove it if unnecessary.

ux_issues.description: Container 'App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_2' has only one child ('App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_2.CTkFrame_0'), which is also a container. This may be unnecessary nesting.
ux_issues.recommended_fix: Consider merging 'App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_2' and 'App_root.CTkTabview_0.CTkFrame_2.CTkFrame_0' into a single container to simplify the widget hierarchy.

ux_issues.description: The form contains input fields but no recognisable primary action button (e.g. Submit, Save, OK). Users may not know how to complete the form.
ux_issues.recommended_fix: Add a clearly labelled primary action button such as 'Submit', 'Save', or 'OK'.
